title: I've been summons for credit card debt. i am unemployed. i am in calif. please advise, what should i do?
question: i've been summons for credit card debt. i am unemployed. i am in calif. please advise, what should i do?
answers:
Disclaimer: The materials provided below are informational and should not be relied upon as legal advice.

If you have been served with summons and complaint, under California law you have 30 days to file and serve your answer. Otherwise, plaintiff may obtain a default judgment against you. If you cannot hire a lawyer, take a look at the web links below for the Legal Aid Foundation of Los Angeles or Bet Tzedek Legal Services; they may be able to assist you in your defense. You should also consult a bankruptcy lawyer as that may be another option to you.
